Why Choose JN Scrap?

Steel Scrap

1. Reliable and Efficient Service: At JN Scrap, we prioritize reliability and efficiency. Our experienced team ensures prompt and hassle-free scrap collection, providing top-notch service to our clients.

2. Competitive Pricing: We offer the best prices for your scrap materials. Our transparent pricing policy ensures you get fair value for your recyclable items.

3. Wide Range of Scrap Materials Accepted: From electronic waste and metal scrap to plastic and paper, we buy a wide variety of scrap materials. Our comprehensive services cater to diverse needs, making us a one-stop solution for all your scrap selling requirements.

4. Eco-Friendly Disposal: Environmental sustainability is at the heart of our operations. We adhere to strict recycling and disposal guidelines to minimize our ecological footprint and promote a greener Bangalore.

5. Convenient Pickup Services: Our convenient pickup services are designed to make your life easier. Schedule a pickup at your convenience, and our team will be there to collect your scrap materials.

Steel Scrap Buyers

Residential Scrap Buying: Clear out your home clutter and earn cash by selling your scrap materials. We buy old appliances, electronic waste, metal, and more, ensuring a clean and eco-friendly disposal process. Commercial Scrap Buying: Businesses generate significant amounts of scrap materials. We offer tailored solutions for commercial entities, helping you manage and dispose of scrap efficiently. Industrial Scrap Buying: Industries produce large quantities of scrap, including metal, plastic, and electronic waste. Our specialized services cater to the needs of industrial clients, ensuring compliance with environmental regulations. Electronic Waste Recycling: Proper disposal of electronic waste is crucial for environmental protection. We provide safe and responsible recycling services for all types of electronic waste.

FAQ'S

At JN Scrap, we are dedicated to promoting a cleaner, greener Bangalore through responsible scrap buying and recycling practices. Partner with us and make a positive impact on the environment while earning cash for your scrap materials.

Visit our website at https://jnscrap.co.in/ to learn more about our services and get started.

What is a scrap buyer ?

A person who buys and sells old metal, etc. that can be used for new purposes.

How many types of scrap are there ?

There are two main categories of metals: ferrous and non-ferrous. Metals which contain iron in them are known as ferrous.
Metals without iron are non-ferrous. Common non-ferrous metals are copper, brass, aluminum, zinc, magnesium, tin, nickel, and lead.

Ferrous Metal and Non-Ferrous Metals ?

There are two main categories of metals: ferrous and non-ferrous.
Metals which contain iron in them are known as ferrous. Metals without iron are non-ferrous.

What is the most common scrap metal ?

A person who buys and sells old metal, etc. that can be used for new purposes.

What kind of scrap metal is worth money ?

All types of scrap metal are worth money. However, non-ferrous metals usually are worth the most. Those include: Copper Aluminum Brass Stainless Steel

What do you do with scrap metal ?

Scrap metal are used many times after recycling. Aluminum steel are reused commonly in new food packages. However, reused scrap can also be found in art, especially in modern art pieces.
